column9:
Thank you for your email.

I will be away from the office for two weeks from Saturday. 4 July and will return on Monday. 20 July 2015.

For all business related enquiries. please contact our office on 08 8447 5800 where our helpful staff can assist you further.

Any project-specific enquiries can be directed to Stacey Taylor (Project Administrator) either on the office number above. or on her mobile 0423 501 109.  Alternatively. she can be reached at s.taylor@klekroofing.com.au.

Otherwise. if your matter is urgent. please call my mobile 0402 206 644.

Kind regards. 

Mik Kirasic
Construction Manager
